text: meta has a long history of open sourcing
particularly when it comes to generative
AI really for over the past decade we've
been focused on putting open source

developers the reason why we do that is
um we see that or open source drives
faster Innovation it drives feedback on
the products that we're developing and
the models that we're putting out into
the community we believe that that
ultimately results and safer um more
performant uh models and tools Amazon's
been a great partner in the development
of open Innovation around Ai and I think
what's so special about this partnership
today is that you know meta is driving
incredible Innovation on on the large
language model front and Amazon brings
to the table um incredible
infrastructure and customers who trust
that infrastructure so when you bring
together the models that we're building

really creates a a great synergistic

something unique and special to

really open up a world of possibilities
to developers I think the really unique

that you can basically deploy large

in a no code way and you can do that in
conjunction with the AWS tools and
resources that you know and already
familiar with as a company and you don't

Bedrock enables you to scale your usage

and um we we put larger models out there
for more complex use cases aside from um

there are two things that really set

more control and are able to customize
